name: Stc-isp
tagline: An command line STC 8051 ISP programmer for linux
body:
_**An STC 8051 ISP programmer for linux**_
_**for more information please use -h help**_

_**this is a hack from gSTCISP, I convert gtk(2.0) version to command version**_
_**maybe, someone are looking for...just try this tools...**_

### 1. INSTALL

```
make
```

### 2. limitations

 1. use TTL to USB to download (PL2303 chip) if your 
	   development board have, Better
 2. for some unknown reason, TTL to RS232 cannot download, 
	   so if you konw, just hack my code.

### 3. shell script


**you can add this two func to your ~/.bashrc, One key download:**


#### 1). one key compile, will makedir build in current dir.

```
stc-cc() {
CUR_PATH=`pwd`
	if [ ! -d $CUR_PATH/build ]; then
		mkdir $CUR_PATH/build
	fi

	cd $CUR_PATH/build
	sdcc -mmcs51 $CUR_PATH/$1
}
```

#### 2). one key compile and download to the chip!

```
stc-cisp() {
CUR_PATH=`pwd`
# make build in current dir
	if [ ! -d $CUR_PATH/build ]; then
		mkdir $CUR_PATH/build
	fi

# compile
	sourceFile=$CUR_PATH/build/$1
	cd $CUR_PATH/build
	sdcc -mmcs51 $CUR_PATH/$1
	cd $CUR_PATH
	stcisp -f ${sourceFile%.*}.ihx
}
```
